thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce shows off her HUGE maternal bump as she steps out in NYC
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce shows off her HUGE maternal bump as she steps out in NYC

author: mirror
title: Pregnant Beyonce shows off her HUGE maternal bump as she steps out in NYC
text:
Pregnant Beyonce shows off her HUGE maternal bump as she steps out in NYC The chart-topper was clearly glowing at the Manhattan bash Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
She was recently forced to cancel her eagerly-anticipated performance at Coachella music festival, but that hasn't stopped pregnant Beyonce Knowles from enjoying the occasional night out. 
But, in case that wasn't clear, the blonde beauty was out in force across New York City on Saturday night. 
The chart-topper, who is pregnant with twins, was on fine form as she showcased her maternal figure in a stunning white dress which clung to her curves at a fundraiser for Manhattan's Alvin Ailey dance theatre. 
Posing up a storm for the camera, the former Destiny's Child star dazzled as she worked her latest look, which also included a long pink cashmere overcoat for extra sass. 
Wearing her hair in a sleek side-parting, she added a plunging neckline to the mix and capped it all with a pair of metallic designer shoes. Beyonce poses up a storm during her latest night out (Photo: Beyonce.com) The chart-topper wowed fans with her sleek and sophisticated style (Photo: Beyonce.com) Read More Beyonce shows off pregnancy style in touching video of baby bump during award season 
Cradling her baby bump, she seemed more than comfortable, despite her dramatically-changing shape. 
The latest outing comes shortly after Beyonce and Jay Z attended a bash for her stepfather’s birthday. 
There, the Single Ladies star flaunted her blossoming baby bump in a tight fitting black velvet dress and over the knee boots as she joined family members for the special occasion. 
And being Beyonce, a few selfies from the dinner table wouldn’t do: instead she posed for a mini photoshoot in her birthday outfit, trying out a variety of poses which she uploaded to her official website on Monday. The pregnant singer teased fans with yet another selfie (Photo: Beyonce.com) Pictured cradling her ever-growing baby bump (Photo: Beyonce.com) Beyonce attends step-dad Richard Lawson's birthday dinner (Photo: mstinalawson/Instagram) Read More Pregnant Beyonce flaunts her baby bump after pre-Oscars party with husband Jay Z 
Bey's mum Tina threw her husband Richard a surprise bash to mark the big day, after he turned 70 last Tuesday. 
The special birthday dinner actually took place last week, and Tina had uploaded a few snaps from the occasion to Instagram at the time. 
One shot showed the whole family standing together for a group photo at the restaurant, but Beyonce’s outfit was hidden as she stood behind her mum for the image. Like us on Facebook
